datasets.name: d12e1ba0
datasets.query:
select count(distinct personid),
--,coalesce(IDDA,0) as IDDA,coalesce(IDDB,0) as IDDB,coalesce(IDDC,0) as IDDC,
--coalesce(IDDD,0) as IDDD,coalesce(IDDE,0) as IDDE, greatest(coalesce(IDDA,0),coalesce(IDDB,0),
--coalesce(IDDC,0),coalesce(IDDD,0),coalesce(IDDE,0) ) as IDD 
--from( select distinct c.personid, 
case  when ct.conceptcode  in 
('Q87.11','Q90.0','Q90.1','Q90.2','Q90.9','Q91.0','Q91.1','Q91.2','Q91.3','Q91.4','Q91.5','Q91.6',
'Q91.7','Q92.0','Q92.1','Q92.2','Q92.5','Q92.62','Q92.7','Q92.8','Q92.9','Q93.0','Q93.1','Q93.2','Q93.3',
'Q93.4','Q93.5','Q93.51','Q93.59','Q93.7','Q93.81','Q93.88','Q93.89','Q93.9','Q95.2','Q95.3','Q99.2') then 'IDDA'   
when ct.conceptcode in ('G80.0','G80.1','G80.2','G80.3','G80.4','G80.8','G80.9') then 'IDDB'  
when ct.conceptcode in ('F84.0','F84.1','F84.2','F84.3','F84.4','F84.5','F84.8','F84.9') then 'IDDC'  
when ct.conceptcode in ('Q86.0','F70','F71','F72','F73','F78','F78.A1','F78.A9','F79') then 'IDDD'  
when ct.conceptcode in ('F82','F88','F89','G31.81','M95.2', 'Q04.0', 'Q04.1', 'Q04.2', 'Q04.3','Q04.4', 'Q04.5', 
'Q04.6', 'Q04.8', 'Q04.9','P04.3','Q67.6', 'Q76.7', 'Q67.8', 'Q68.1', 'Q74.3','Q70.00', 'Q70.01', 'Q70.02', 'Q70.03', 
'Q70.10', 'Q70.11', 'Q70.12', 'Q70.13', 'Q70.20', 'Q70.21', 'Q70.22', 'Q70.23', 'Q70.30', 'Q70.31', 'Q70.32', 'Q70.33', 
'Q70.4', 'Q70.9','Q85.1','Q87.1','Q87.19','Q87.2','Q87.3','Q87.5','Q87.81',
'Q87.82','Q87.89','Q89.7','Q89.8','R41.83') then 'IDDE'  end
 as IDD from cdh_truveta.condition c 
 --All pts,all diagnosis in universal dx table 
 left join cdh_truveta.conditioncodeconceptmap m on 
 c.codeconceptmapid=m.id left join cdh_truveta.concept ct 
 on m.codeconceptid=ct.conceptid  --) as p  
group by IDD
--- pivot (       count(1)      for IDD in ('IDDA','IDDB','IDDC','IDDD','IDDE') ) )

datasets.name: 7fa3252a
datasets.query:
SELECT
featurename,count( distinct conceptcode),count(distinct personid)
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition c 
-- join between feature table and truveta.concept
 join feature_idd f
on f.conceptid=c.conceptid
GROUP BY featurename
order by featurename

recordeddatetime, clinicalstatusconceptid,primarydiagnosisconceptid
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition c join feature_idd f
on f.conceptid=c.conceptid

datasets.name: 5d64353d
datasets.query:
SELECT 
featurename,personid,
count(distinct c.encounterid) as encounters, 
--count(distinct c.patientid) as patients, 
min(recordeddatetime) as earliest,
max(recordeddatetime) as latest,
collect_set(primarydiagnosisconceptid) as primarydiagnoses,
collect_set(c.conceptid) as conceptids,
collect_set(conceptcode) as conceptcodes
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition c join feature_idd f
on f.conceptid=c.conceptid
GROUP BY personid,f.featurename

datasets.name: 8a466c1d
datasets.query: SELECT distinct * FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition

datasets.name: b6fdfa34
datasets.query:
select distinct 
     f.feature_name,
      element_at(split(f.feature_name, '_'), -1) as virus_type_code,
      c.conceptcode,
      c.conceptid
    from
      edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_lava_dev.code_local_valuesets f
      join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept c 
      on f.concept_code = c.conceptcode
    where
      feature_name in ('diag_icd_covid', 'diag_icd_flu')

datasets.name: 2a465013
datasets.query:
SELECT count( DISTINCT
  o.personid),
  count(distinct o.encounterid),
--  o.codeconceptmapid,
--  o.recordeddatetime,
  condit.virus_type AS virus_type_code
FROM
     condition o
    JOIN conditioncodeconceptmap cm
      ON o.codeconceptmapid = cm.id
    JOIN (
      -- COVID concepts
      SELECT
        'covid' AS virus_type,
        cn.conceptid
      FROM
        edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_lava_dev.code_diag_icd_covid codes
          JOIN concept cn
            ON cn.conceptcode = codes.diag_icd_covid_code
      WHERE
        cn.codesystem = 'ICD10CM'
      UNION
      -- Flu concepts
      SELECT
        'flu' AS virus_type,
        cn.conceptid
      FROM
        edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_lava_dev.code_diag_icd_flu codes
          JOIN concept cn
            ON cn.conceptcode = codes.diag_icd_flu_code
      WHERE
        cn.codesystem = 'ICD10CM'
    ) AS condit
      ON condit.conceptid = cm.codeconceptid
WHERE
  o.RecordedDateTime >= '2022-08-01'
  group by virus_type
--ORDER BY personid,recordeddatetime,encounterid

datasets.name: bd64fdf1
datasets.query:
--- 'diag_icd_covid','diag_icd_flu'
SELECT
  virus_type,
  count(DISTINCT o.personid),
  count(DISTINCT o.encounterid) --  o.encounterid,
  --  o.codeconceptmapid,
  --  o.recordeddatetime,
  --  condit.virus_type AS virus_type_code
FROM
  condition o
  JOIN conditioncodeconceptmap cm ON o.codeconceptmapid = cm.id
  JOIN (
    select
      distinct f.feature_name,
      element_at(split(f.feature_name, '_'), -1) as virus_type,
      c.conceptcode,
      c.conceptid
    from
      edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_lava_dev.code_local_valuesets f
      join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept c on f.concept_code = c.conceptcode
    where
      feature_name in ('diag_icd_covid', 'diag_icd_flu')
  ) AS condit ON condit.conceptid = cm.codeconceptid
WHERE
  o.RecordedDateTime >= '2022-08-01'
GROUP BY
  virus_type --ORDER BY
  --  personid,
  --  recordeddatetime,
  --  encounterid

datasets.name: 27ff7c20
datasets.query:
--- 'diag_icd_covid','diag_icd_flu'
SELECT
  feature_name as virus_type,
--  date_format(recordeddatetime,'YYYY-MM') as month,
  count(DISTINCT personid),
    count(DISTINCT encounterid) --  o.encounterid,
  from
(SELECT
  distinct ft.feature_name,
  tc.personid,
   tc.encounterid,
  tc.recordeddatetime
FROM
  edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition tc -- condition+conditioncodeconceptmap
  join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept tcc 
  on tc.conceptid = tcc.conceptid
  join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_lava_dev.code_local_valuesets ft --feature table
  on ft.concept_code = tcc.conceptcode
where
  tc.RecordedDateTime >= '2022-08-01' and
  ft.feature_name in ('diag_icd_covid', 'diag_icd_flu') --feature filter
ORDER BY
---  personid,
  recordeddatetime,
  feature_name)
  group by feature_name

datasets.name: 202afd3c
datasets.query:
--- 'diag_icd_covid','diag_icd_flu'
SELECT
  f.feature_name,
  count(DISTINCT personid),
  count(DISTINCT encounterid)
FROM
  edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.truveta_condition tc
  join (
    select
      distinct feature_name,
      tcc.conceptid
    from
      edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept tcc
      join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.ml_code_local_valuesets ft
       on ft.concept_code = tcc.conceptcode
    where
      ft.feature_name in ('diag_icd_covid', 'diag_icd_flu')
  ) f on f.conceptid = tc.conceptid
GROUP BY
  f.feature_name --ORDER BY
  --  personid,
  --  recordeddatetime,
  --  encounterid

datasets.name: 7e9db6d9
datasets.query:
SELECT * FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.ml_code_local_valuesets
where feature_name like '%flu%'

datasets.name: 6cc16dbd
datasets.query:
--- 'diag_icd_covid','diag_icd_flu'
--- uses cdh_ml.ml_code_local_valuesets ... 
---  the lava code_local_valuesets augumented with additional vocabulary synonyms based on OMOP standard conceptid
SELECT
  feature_name,
  count(DISTINCT o.personid),
  count(distinct o.encounterid) --,
  --  o.codeconceptmapid,
--  o.recordeddatetime,
--  condit.virus_type AS virus_type_code
FROM
  condition o
  JOIN conditioncodeconceptmap cm ON o.codeconceptmapid = cm.id
  JOIN (
  --- must be select DISTINCT here
    select distinct 
     f.feature_name,
      element_at(split(f.feature_name, '_'), -1) as virus_type,
      c.conceptcode,
      c.conceptid
    from
      edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.ml_code_local_valuesets f
      join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept c 
      on f.concept_code = c.conceptcode
    where
      feature_name in ('diag_icd_covid', 'diag_icd_flu')    
  ) AS condit ON condit.conceptid = cm.codeconceptid
WHERE
  o.RecordedDateTime >= '2022-08-01'
group BY
  feature_name

datasets.name: 047b284e
datasets.query:
--Deaths: code for edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_exploratory.ak21_truveta_encounterv2
with conids as (select conceptid from cdh_truveta.concept where ConceptCode in ('1065237', '1065240', '2703594', '2703596') 
                ),

     mapids as (Select id from cdh_truveta.conditioncodeconceptmap where  codeconceptid in (select conceptid from conids) union
                Select id from cdh_truveta.labresultcodeconceptmap where  codeconceptid in (select conceptid from conids) union
                Select id from cdh_truveta.medicationcodeconceptmap where  codeconceptid in (select conceptid from conids) union
                Select id from cdh_truveta.observationcodeconceptmap where  codeconceptid in (select conceptid from conids) union
                Select id from cdh_truveta.procedurecodeconceptmap where  codeconceptid in (select conceptid from conids) 
               ),

        patenc as (select personid from cdh_truveta.condition where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids)  union
                 select personid from cdh_truveta.procedure where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids)  union
                 select personid from cdh_truveta.observation where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids) union
                 select personid from cdh_truveta.labresult where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids)  union
                 select personid from cdh_truveta.medicationadministration where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids)  union
                 select personid from cdh_truveta.medicationrequest where codeconceptmapid in (select id from mapids)   
               ) 

          select distinct personid,id,startdatetime,enddatetime,classconceptid,typeconceptid,dischargedispositionconceptid,'dead' as clr 
          from cdh_truveta.encounter where personid in (select personid from patenc)

datasets.name: 974f9003
datasets.query:
(SELECT "may2024" as version,count(*) as records, count(DISTINCT EncounterId) as encounters,
count(DISTINCT Id) as ids, count(DISTINCT personId) as persons, 
count(DISTINCT patientid) as patients
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta_exploratory.a1c_results) union
(SELECT "new" as version,count(*) as records, count(DISTINCT EncounterId) as encounters,
count(DISTINCT Id) as ids, count(DISTINCT personId) as persons, 
count(DISTINCT patientid) as patients
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.A1C_results ) union
 (SELECT "join" as version,count(*) as records, count(DISTINCT EncounterId) as encounters,
count(DISTINCT Id) as ids, count(DISTINCT personId) as persons, 
count(DISTINCT patientid) as patients
 FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.a1c_results_join)

FROM edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.condition tc
where tc.codeconceptmapid<100

datasets.name: 707b0d35
datasets.query:
select 
cc.id as codeconditionmapid,
oc.tar_concept_id as ohdsi_concept_id,
c.conceptcode as tru_concept_code,
oc.concept_code as ohdsi_concept_code,
oc.src_vocabulary_id as ohdsi_vocabulary,
c.codesystem as tru_vocabulary,
c.conceptid as truveta_conceptid,
c.conceptname 
from edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.conditioncodeconceptmap  cc
left join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_truveta.concept c
on cc.codeconceptid=c.conceptid
left join edav_prd_cdh.cdh_ml.omop_concept_condition oc
on oc.concept_code=c.conceptcode --and oc.src_vocabulary_id=c.codesystem
order by codeconditionmapid,conceptcode,codesystem

datasets.name: d9601dcb
datasets.displayName: Condition Truveta IN Strategy filtered by list
datasets.query:
-- filter all conditions to only include ones where there is at least one mapping that maps to a code in my tbl_codes view
-- this DOES NOT return the conceptcode to the record
SELECT distinct
   EncounterId, PatientId, PersonId, recordedDateTime, SequenceNumber,CodeConceptMapId
FROM
  Condition c
WHERE
  c.CodeConceptMapId IN (
    SELECT
      ccm.Id
    FROM
      ConditionCodeConceptMap ccm
    WHERE
      ccm.CodeConceptId IN (
        SELECT
          CodeConceptId
        FROM
          Concept cc
        WHERE
          (
            cc.conceptcode in (
    'J10.1',
    'J10.2'
--    'J10.8',
--    'J11.0',
--    'J11.00',
--    'J11.08',
--    'J11.1',
--    'J11.2',
--    'J11.8'
            )
          )
      )
  )
  ORDER BY EncounterId, PatientId, PersonId, recordedDateTime, SequenceNumber,CodeConceptMapId

datasets.name: 74b5fc9d
datasets.query:
-- filter all conditions to only include ones where there is at least one mapping that maps to a code in my tbl_codes view
-- this DOES NOT return the conceptcode to the record
SELECT
  DISTINCT c.*
FROM
  Condition c
  JOIN ConditionCodeConceptMap cc 
    ON c.CodeConceptMapId = cc.Id
  JOIN concept co
    on cc.CodeConceptId=co.ConceptId
where
  co.conceptcode in (
    'J10.1',
    'J10.2'
--    'J10.8',
--    'J11.0',
--    'J11.00',
--    'J11.08',
--    'J11.1',
--    'J11.2',
--    'J11.8'
  )

widget.name: 57e33fe1
widget.textbox_spec:
###Truveta [Condition to Concept Code](https://learn.truveta.com/studio/docs/transitioning-to-new-lookup-tables-1#1-conditioncodeconceptmap-table)  

**IN** strategy does not return a concept_code, but filters to the list of **table_index_codes** which is created by Prose methods
```sql
%%sql 
SELECT
    *   
FROM 
   Condition condition 
WHERE
   condition.Id IN (SELECT ConditionId 
   FROM ConditionCodes 
   WHERE CodeConceptId IN (SELECT ConceptId FROM tbl_index_codes));
```

**JOIN** strategy is computationally expensive and if used should be done once and only once, as it is a three way join with a select distinct, although even the select distinct will not eliminate all duplicates
```sql
SELECT DISTINCT c.*
FROM Condition c
JOIN ConditionCodeConceptMap cc ON c.CodeConceptMapId = cc.Id
JOIN tbl_index_codes ic ON cc.CodeConceptId = ic.ConceptId;
```

widget.name: feb52cb5
widget.textbox_spec:
Truveta **conditions** table has duplicates by design  
From [Truveta Conditions](https://learn.truveta.com/studio/docs/conditions)  documentation  
> **EncounterId** - Records in general are not always associated with an encounter. This will vary depending on the record type (conditions, labs, medications). For conditions specifically, conditions can be entered in a patients chart outside of the context of an encounter by a clinician, the patient, or an interface. These will often manifest as "Problem List" or "Medical History" conditions and it is not expected that they be associated with an encounter. Similarly billing conditions may be ingested from the EHR and may not be explicitly tied to an encounter, though when Truveta makes Patient Accounts available, they may be able to link to an encounter through a hospital account's primary encounter. **Truveta has made the decision to pull in conditions from as many sources as possible to increase the sensitivity of detecting patients who may need diagnoses represented from multiple data entry workflows to fully represent all of their comorbidities.**

frame.description: Filtered to 'J10.1', 'J10.2', 'J10.8','J11.0', 'J11.00','J11.08','J11.1','J11.2', 'J11.8' but Concept Code not in table
